crewCreator.title: Assemble Your Crew
crewCreator.subtitle: Create a crew of 4 to 6 members to explore the galaxy.
crewCreator.readySubtitle: Your crew is assembled and their stories have begun. Time to find some work.
crewCreator.loadoutModalSubtitle: Select up to 3 weapons, 3 consumables, 1 armor, and 1 screen for {name}.
crewCreator.shipSectionSubtitle: Every crew needs a ride. Roll the dice and see what you get.
crewCreator.selectLeaderSubtitle: Pick one character to lead your crew. They receive +1 Luck and will never leave the crew through random events.
crewCreator.selectLeaderFirst: Please select a leader and roll for Story Points first.
crewCreator.rollStartingSP: Roll to determine your starting Story Points.

leader.title: Create Your Leader
leader.step_race: Step 1: Choose your species. This determines your base statistics and unique racial abilities.
leader.step_background: Step 2: Choose your background. This describes where your character comes from and what life was like before they started adventuring.
leader.step_motivation: Step 3: Choose your motivation. This is the driving force behind your character's actions and ambitions.
leader.step_class: Step 4: Choose your class. This represents your profession or primary skillset.
leader.selectOption: Select an option to see details.
leader.subtitle: Create your starting crew of 4 to 6 members. Your first character will be the crew's leader.
leader.reviewSubtitle: Review your character's final details. You can go back to make changes or confirm to proceed.

crewCreator.equipmentNote: Equipment is added to a shared pool for the whole crew.
crewCreator.selectAttributes: Select attributes to see final stats.
crewCreator.proceedToFinalize: You may now proceed to the final step.

kerin_brawl.name: Brawl Adept
kerin_brawl.desc: When Brawling, K’Erin characters may roll twice, picking the better of the dice.

kerin_must_brawl.name: Must Brawl
kerin_must_brawl.desc: If a K’Erin character begins their round within base movement speed of an enemy, they MUST move to engage them in Brawling combat.

precursor_event.name: Precursor Event
precursor_event.desc: If this character is the subject of a Character Event, you may roll for 2 events and pick which one you prefer.

swift_fly.name: Fly
swift_fly.desc: May use their Movement Action to glide down to a lower position.

swift_volley.name: Volley Fire
swift_volley.desc: When firing a weapon with multiple shots, must direct every shot at the same target.

feral_initiative.name: Feral Initiative
feral_initiative.desc: If a Feral crew member takes part in a battle, all enemy-imposed penalties to Seize the Initiative rolls are ignored.

feral_reaction_fumble.name: Reaction Fumble
feral_reaction_fumble.desc: When making a Reaction Roll, if the dice only score a single 1, it must be given to a Feral member, if possible.

stalker_teleport.name: Teleport
stalker_teleport.desc: May teleport 1D6” as an Alternative Movement option. Can be upgraded with XP.

hulker_rules.name: Hulker Rules
hulker_rules.desc: Ignores the Clumsy and Heavy traits on weapons.

manipulator_rules.name: Manipulator Rules
manipulator_rules.desc: Cannot enter a Brawl voluntarily. May fire 2 Pistols in the same round at separate targets.

backgrounds.peaceful_high_tech_desc: You grew up in a utopian society where technology solved all problems.
backgrounds.dystopian_city_desc: Your home is an overcrowded, grim metropolis where only the strong survive.
backgrounds.low_tech_colony_desc: You lived a frontier life with simple tools and constant hardship.
backgrounds.mining_colony_desc: Your life was one of hard labor under the harsh light of alien suns.
backgrounds.military_brat_desc: Raised on a series of military bases, you are disciplined and well-traveled.
backgrounds.space_station_desc: You know the hum of life support and the silent threat of the vacuum better than solid ground.
backgrounds.military_outpost_desc: You spent your formative years on a dangerous border, defined by vigilance and conflict.
backgrounds.drifter_desc: You never stayed in one place for long, moving between worlds and learning to adapt.
backgrounds.lower_megacity_desc: You're from the underbelly of a giant city, a world of crime, pollution, and desperation.
backgrounds.wealthy_merchant_desc: You come from a life of privilege and commerce, but chose a different path.
backgrounds.frontier_gang_desc: You grew up fighting for territory and scraps on the lawless edge of space.
backgrounds.religious_cult_desc: You were raised within a strict, esoteric, and all-encompassing belief system.
backgrounds.war_torn_desc: You are a survivor of a brutal conflict that has irrevocably shaped your worldview.
backgrounds.tech_guild_desc: You were a member of an organization that jealously guards and advances technology.
backgrounds.alien_colony_desc: You lived as part of a subjugated population on a world that was not your own.
backgrounds.space_mission_desc: You were part of a long-term exploration or research mission that went off course.
backgrounds.research_outpost_desc: You lived a life of scientific isolation on the fringe of known space.
backgrounds.primitive_world_desc: You hail from a world without advanced technology, relying on strength and cunning.
backgrounds.orphan_program_desc: You were raised by the state for a specific purpose, your childhood a training ground.
backgrounds.isolationist_desc: You grew up in a closed-off enclave, taught to be wary of all outsiders.
backgrounds.comfortable_megacity_desc: You had a safe and predictable life in the upper levels of a metropolis.
backgrounds.industrial_world_desc: Your world was one of factories, smog, and relentless, grinding work.
backgrounds.bureaucrat_desc: You spent your life navigating endless red tape and official channels.
backgrounds.wasteland_nomads_desc: You traveled the barren wastes with your tribe, learning to survive in the harshest environments.
backgrounds.alien_culture_desc: You were raised among a non-human species, adopting many of their customs and ways.

motivations.wealth_desc: You just want to get rich.
motivations.fame_desc: You want to be known throughout the galaxy.
motivations.glory_desc: You seek honor and glory in battle.
motivations.survival_desc: You're just trying to make it to the next day.
motivations.escape_desc: You're on the run from something, or someone.
motivations.adventure_desc: You crave the thrill of the unknown.
motivations.truth_desc: You are seeking the answers to a great mystery.
motivations.technology_desc: You want to find lost tech or create new gadgets.
motivations.discovery_desc: You want to see new worlds and map the unknown.
motivations.loyalty_desc: You are fiercely devoted to a person, cause, or organization.
motivations.revenge_desc: Someone wronged you, and you're going to make them pay.
motivations.romance_desc: You're searching for a lost love, or a new one.
motivations.faith_desc: You are driven by your religious or spiritual beliefs.
motivations.political_desc: You want to change the political landscape of the galaxy.
motivations.power_desc: You seek to accumulate personal power and influence.
motivations.order_desc: You want to bring law and order to the chaotic Fringe.
motivations.freedom_desc: You fight against oppression, for yourself and others.

classes.working_class_desc: A common laborer, tough and practical, you're the backbone of the galaxy.
classes.technician_desc: An expert in repairing, maintaining, and understanding technology of all kinds.
classes.scientist_desc: A researcher driven by curiosity and the relentless pursuit of knowledge.
classes.hacker_desc: You bend digital systems to your will, a ghost in the machine.
classes.soldier_desc: You have formal military training and experience in organized combat.
classes.mercenary_desc: A soldier for hire, your loyalty and skills belong to the highest bidder.
classes.agitator_desc: A political firebrand, you stir up trouble and rebellion wherever you go.
classes.primitive_desc: A warrior from a low-tech world, you are fierce, resourceful, and underestimated.
classes.artist_desc: You find expression and meaning through your art in a chaotic galaxy.
classes.negotiator_desc: A diplomat and deal-maker, your words are your greatest weapon.
classes.trader_desc: You buy low, sell high, and always know the shifting currents of the market.
classes.starship_crew_desc: A veteran of the void, you're as comfortable on the bridge of a ship as you are on solid ground.
classes.petty_criminal_desc: You've lived a life of minor crimes and scams just to get by.
classes.ganger_desc: A member of a street gang, your loyalty is to your colors and your crew.
classes.scoundrel_desc: A charming rogue who lives by your wits, always one step ahead of trouble.
classes.enforcer_desc: You provide the muscle for a powerful organization, carrying out their will.
classes.special_agent_desc: A clandestine operative, you have a license to get things done, by any means necessary.
classes.troubleshooter_desc: You're a specialist in solving... violent problems for those who can pay.
classes.bounty_hunter_desc: You hunt targets for money, no questions asked. It's a dangerous but profitable life.
classes.nomad_desc: A wanderer with no fixed home, you are skilled in survival across diverse environments.
classes.explorer_desc: You've charted the unknown corners of the galaxy, always seeking what's over the next horizon.
classes.punk_desc: A rebel against the system, you live by your own rules with a distinctive, anti-authoritarian style.
classes.scavenger_desc: You make a living by picking through the galaxy's trash, finding treasure where others see junk.

races.baseline_human_desc: The adaptable and widespread default of humanity.
races.bot_desc: Mechanical constructs programmed for specific tasks.
races.engineer_desc: Slim humanoids with a fragile physique and a talent for machinery.
races.kerin_desc: Proud and warlike aliens with a peculiar sense of honor.
races.soulless_desc: Cybernetic organisms connected into a combined hive-intelligence.
races.precursor_desc: Graceful and refined alien humanoids who traveled the stars eons ago.
races.swift_desc: Diminutive, winged, lizard people with erratic, jerky motions.
races.feral_desc: Humanoid-animal hybrids, typically patterned on Earth predators.

rules.bot_upgrades: Does not earn XP, is upgraded with credits.
rules.bot_no_events: Cannot be the subject of a Character Event.
rules.kerin_must_brawl: Must move to engage in Brawling if starting within base movement speed of an enemy.
rules.precursor_event_choice: When subject to a Character Event, may roll twice and pick the result.
rules.swift_fly: Can glide, leap gaps, and jump from any height without damage.
rules.swift_volley: Must direct all shots from a multi-shot weapon at the same target.
rules.feral_initiative: Ignore enemy penalties to Seize the Initiative rolls.
rules.feral_reaction_fumble: If the crew rolls only a single 1 for Reaction Rolls, it must be given to a Feral member.
rules.soulless_armor: Receives a 6+ Armor Saving Throw due to their metallic construction.
rules.soulless_no_implants: Cannot use consumables or receive implants. Uses the Bot Injury table.
rules.soulless_upgrades: May have Bot Upgrades installed at 1.5x cost.
